languages.text: "Среди них выделялся некий сержант Вигастис, израненный мужчина с потрепанным лазружьем. Он просил передать вам свою благодарность за спасение из Темного города, и сообщил о готовности перейти в ваше распоряжение".

"There is one notable figure among them — a certain Sergeant Vigastes, a severely injured man armed with a worn lasgun. He has asked to send you his gratitude for saving him from the Dark City and declared his willingness to serve under your command."
languages.original_text: "Среди них выделялся некий сержант Вигастис, израненный мужчина с потрепанным лазружьем. Он просил передать вам свою благодарность за спасение из Темного города, и сообщил о готовности перейти в ваше распоряжение".

traits.locale_text: "A notable figure among them was sergeant Vigastes, a man with lots of injuries and a worn lasgun. He asked to convey his gratitude for saving him from the Dark City and informed about his readiness to be under your command."

"A notable figure among them was sergeant Vigastes, a man with lots of injuries and a worn lasgun. He asked to convey his gratitude for saving him from the Dark City and informed about his readiness to be under your command."

"A notable figure among them was sergeant Vigastes, a heavily injured man with a worn lasgun. He asked to pass his gratitude for saving him from the Dark City and informed us about his readiness to serve under your command."

"A notable figure among them was sergeant Vigastes, a heavily injured man with a worn lasgun. He asked to pass his gratitude for saving him from the Dark City and informed us about his readiness to serve under your command."

"There is one notable figure among them — a certain Sergeant Vigastes, a severely injured man armed with a worn lasgun. He has asked to send you his gratitude for saving him from the Dark City and declared his willingness to serve under your command."

languages.text: “在这些人之中，有个叫‘维加斯特军士’的人十分值得注意。他受了重伤，手里拿着一把破旧的激光枪。他请求我转达他的谢意，他十分感激您将他从黑暗之城中解救出来，声称愿意听从您的指挥。”
languages.original_text: "There is one notable figure among them — a certain Sergeant Vigastes, a severely injured man armed with a worn lasgun. He has asked to send you his gratitude for saving him from the Dark City and declared his willingness to serve under your command."

traits.locale_text: “在这些人之中，有个叫‘维加斯特军士’的人十分值得注意。他受了重伤，手里拿着一把破旧的激光枪。他请求我转达他的谢意，他十分感激您将他从黑暗之城中解救出来，声称愿意听从您的指挥。”

languages.text: « Parmi eux se distingue un certain sergent Vigastes, un homme gravement blessé et armé d'un vieux fusil laser. Il nous a demandé de vous remercier de l'avoir sauvé de la Cité Crépusculaire et affirme être prêt à servir sous votre commandement. »
languages.original_text: "There is one notable figure among them — a certain Sergeant Vigastes, a severely injured man armed with a worn lasgun. He has asked to send you his gratitude for saving him from the Dark City and declared his willingness to serve under your command."

traits.locale_text: « Parmi eux se distingue un certain sergent Vigastes, un homme gravement blessé et armé d'un vieux fusil laser. Il nous a demandé de vous remercier de l'avoir sauvé de la Cité Crépusculaire et affirme être prêt à servir sous votre commandement. »

languages.text: "Unter ihnen ist eine bedeutenden Personen ... ein gewisser Sergeant Vigastes, ein schwer verletzter Mann mit einem lädierten Lasergewehr. Er übermittelt Euch seinen Dank für die Rettung aus der Dunklen Stadt und ist bereit, Euch zu dienen."
languages.original_text: "There is one notable figure among them — a certain Sergeant Vigastes, a severely injured man armed with a worn lasgun. He has asked to send you his gratitude for saving him from the Dark City and declared his willingness to serve under your command."

traits.locale_text: "Unter ihnen ist eine bedeutenden Personen ... ein gewisser Sergeant Vigastes, ein schwer verletzter Mann mit einem lädierten Lasergewehr. Er übermittelt Euch seinen Dank für die Rettung aus der Dunklen Stadt und ist bereit, Euch zu dienen."

"Eine ihrer bedeutenden Personen war Sergeant Vigastes, ein schwer verletzter Mann, der ein defektes Lasergewehr bei sich hatte. Er wollte seine Dankbarkeit für die Rettung aus der Dunklen Stadt übermitteln und teilte uns mit, dass er bereit sei, unter Euch zu dienen."

languages.text: «Entre ellos, destaca un tal sargento Vigastes, un hombre gravemente herido que porta un desgastado rifle láser. Nos ha pedido que le traslademos su gratitud por salvarlo de la Ciudad Siniestra y ha anunciado que está dispuesto a seguir sus órdenes».
languages.original_text: "There is one notable figure among them — a certain Sergeant Vigastes, a severely injured man armed with a worn lasgun. He has asked to send you his gratitude for saving him from the Dark City and declared his willingness to serve under your command."

traits.locale_text: «Entre ellos, destaca un tal sargento Vigastes, un hombre gravemente herido que porta un desgastado rifle láser. Nos ha pedido que le traslademos su gratitud por salvarlo de la Ciudad Siniestra y ha anunciado que está dispuesto a seguir sus órdenes».

languages.text: 「その中で特筆すべきはヴィガステス軍曹で、重傷を負い、使い古したラスガンを持っていた。彼は仄暗き都から救ってくれたことへの感謝を伝えたいと言い、あなたの指揮下で働く用意があることを伝えてきた」
languages.original_text: "There is one notable figure among them — a certain Sergeant Vigastes, a severely injured man armed with a worn lasgun. He has asked to send you his gratitude for saving him from the Dark City and declared his willingness to serve under your command."

traits.locale_text: 「その中で特筆すべきはヴィガステス軍曹で、重傷を負い、使い古したラスガンを持っていた。彼は仄暗き都から救ってくれたことへの感謝を伝えたいと言い、あなたの指揮下で働く用意があることを伝えてきた」

languages.text: "Aralarında göze çarpan bir şahıs var. Adına Teğmen Vigastes diyorlar, eskimiş bir silazerle geziyor. Adam ağır yaralı. Kendisini Kara Şehir'den kurtardığınız için size teşekkürlerini iletti. Emrinizde hizmet etmeyi arzuluyormuş."
languages.original_text: "There is one notable figure among them — a certain Sergeant Vigastes, a severely injured man armed with a worn lasgun. He has asked to send you his gratitude for saving him from the Dark City and declared his willingness to serve under your command."
